question: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has cancelled the licence of the CKP Cooperative Bank Ltd. Where is the bank headquartered at?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has recently cancelled the licence of the CKP Cooperative Bank Ltd. It is headquartered at Mumbai and has branches across Mumbai and Thane districts.
As the financial position had weakened and it was unable to repay its depositors, this step has been taken by the countryâ€™s central bank. RBI also announced that there is no plan for revival or proposal for merger with another bank at the time of announcement.
